pages.text: Psi is all about magc spell programming. It requires a little bit of a guide to get into, so let's get started.$(br2)Start by crafting an $(item)Iron Rod Frame$().
Now let's make that rod into a $(item)Focusing Rod$()!$(br2)For that you need a $(item)Rod Constructor$().$(br2)Place it down, put your $(item)Iron Rod Frame$() in and craft a $(item)Focusing Rod$()
The last step, is to take a $(item)book$(), throw it onto the ground and use your $(item)Focusing Rod$() on it!
Study your $(item)Enciclopedia Psionica$() from now on.
